title: It works on my old phone
comment: It works on my LG Motion 4G. It does not work on my Moto X.

title: Don't work
comment: This app display nothing on screen so it's 1 star

title: No wonder it's free...
comment: Because it does NOT work at all. Thought I'd ignore the comments & rating & give it a try! WHAT A WASTE OF TIME!! Do Not Install, it's absolutely useless! (How do I report useless apps, this has to STOP!!)

title: GOOD
comment: HTC
Just didn't work... at all! Recorded nothing! Uninstalled!

title: Good app to remind you what you just installed
comment: This is a good app. Author should allow the app to remember which option user want. To me, it is the installation history by date time. Keep on the good work.

title: People didn't know what they missed out in this one.
comment: This used to be the best app avaliable for keeping sorted all your frequently used apps easily accessible and also reminding you about those you've seem to have forgotten. I would have recommended this one to everybody.

title: Nice idea
comment: But should be greatly improved : multiple widgets, ignore list...

title: Works well on my old Nexus One
comment: but doesn't count useage on my new Galaxy S3 :(

title: Great app, great dev.
comment: I like the app but the widget really needs a way to specify a grid size to fill. I like the top portion of my screen to be clock/weather... Recently I switched devices and apptracker stopped working for me. The Dev worked with me until we got it fixed... top notch developer.

title: Close but not quite
comment: Would pay for it if it let me choose number of rows/colls for the widget. As is it's unusable for me.
Please, this sounds like a nice app, nice purpose. But I can't figure out how to use it! Anyway, I LOVE Pokédroid... Pokédroid Extras, too.
Works as it should
Helps to know sometimes!
Would be great to see the widget for this app expanded to fill an entire homescreen page with a larger list of apps
Pretty cool app and does what it claims. If you're a fan of the old Windows Start Menu feature that shows you your most opened apps then this is it.
Not accurate.
Looks like a decent app, but not tracking app launches through widget presses is a deal killer for me.
Nice but as beddell mentioned it doesn't count widget presses and since I use more icons widget I am not getting an accurate reading on what I use!
Very cool. I don't see value in the widget though.
Nice app but doesn't count when an app is launched via a widget. Eg, I use colour note widgets which launch the app when tapped but these don't count.
Awesome app!! Can expand further with "newest installed" apps
Needs option to sort the icons my way, not just in a column. Besides that I don't really see the point, just press and hold the home button.
Works perfectly on aria, sometimes takes a but to update, but that is really no problem.
